name: gsheets_ts
description: Collects data from google sheets and output them to Timesktech.
short_description: Collects data from google sheets and output them to Timesktech.
args: ID or URL of the Google Sheet spreadsheet to collect data from.
Comma-separated list sheets names to collect date from. Default is 'All' which parses all sheets in the spreadsheet.
Set to True to check for mandatory columns required by TimeSketch while extracting data. Set to False to ignore validation. Default is True.
Sketch to which the timeline should be added
Optional custom password to decrypt Timesketch credential file with
Whether to wait for timelines to finish processing.
